name: Big Kush
description: Big Kush by Dinafem Seeds is a love letter to growers and Kush connoisseurs alike. By combining the generous genetics of Big Skunk with the ever-popular OG Kush, Dinafem has fashioned a strain that exhibits the balanced and flavorful attributes of OG Kush with the fuel-tinged lemon aroma and yield of their Big Bud/Skunk cross. This autoflowering strain finishes in 8 weeks and requires little manicuring due to the conservative number of fan leaves.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Nausea, Pain, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
